title: I want to work
creator_credit: D Lynton Porter, Vroni Gordon and Central Council for Health Education
brief_description: Deals with the problems faced by epileptics seeking employment. Traces the career of a teenage girl on the point of leaving school who finds she is not wanted in any position because she is an epileptic. Finally she joins the British Epileptic Association which helps her to find employment and provides fellowship by the sharing of a common problem.
